Section.name: About JNTUCEP
Section.description:
Jawaharlal Nehru Technical (JNTU) College of Engineering Pulivendula was established in 2006. It is located in a Kadapa district of Andhra Pradesh over about 165 acres. The college is located 3 km from Pulivendula town, 70 km from Kadapa (Distt. capital city).
JNTUCEP AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
